title: Rodney King (film)
text:
Rodney King is a 2017 American <a href="one-man%20show">one-man show</a> directed by <a href="Spike%20Lee">Spike Lee</a> and written by and starring <a href="Roger%20Guenveur%20Smith">Roger Guenveur Smith</a>. The film is a one-man show where Roger Guenveur Smith does a multiplicity of voices, alternately taking and opposing <a href="Rodney%20King">Rodney King</a>'s side.
Production.
Roger Guenveur Smith researched and wrote/improvised the screenplay over the course of a few weeks.
Release.
It was released on April 28, 2017 on Netflix streaming.
